definitions: by means of mathematics; in mathematical terms

examples.text: pressure is described mathematically as a force exerted over an area

definitions: in a way that relates to mathematics

examples.text: to the mathematically inclined person, this book is an excellent introduction

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to mathematics

definitions: in a rigorously precise manner characteristic of mathematics

examples.text: his description of detail is almost mathematically precise

shortDefinitions: in rigorously precise manner characteristic of mathematics
